title: 12/15/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/15/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Lamar Jackson is great, stop trying to pick his game apart

-The Browns have flaws because of all the things they've done to help Baker Mayfield

-There is a specific reason why Aaron Rodgers is having one of his greatest seasons

-Last night was fun but neither the Browns or Ravens are title contenders

-The Herd Hierarchy: Colin's top ten teams in the NFL


Guest: Aqib Talib, Super Bowl Champion DB

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
